channel.title: I need some more help
channel.description:
hello i am the owner of kraftdinnerscape and i need some help
........ i have 2 computers in my house one is my dads thats has are router connected to then i have my computer where i have my server ok one question my server was fine and everything running perficly and then my internet connaction gets lost and my sever shuts down so im like ok no problome just need to restart the server right. so i start it i log on ... 10 mins laterr ... still no one on soooo.... what do i need to do with my or my dads internet conntions so i can have other people on my server again and not just me?? :confused: :confused: :|

item.title: I need some more help
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

you need to port forward again(if you are using the router)

this happens when you shut down your computers and/or your router

Read full topic

item.title: I need some more help
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

If your computer is connected to the router, you’ll need to port forward. Look for a tutorial somewhere. If your comp isn’t on the router, you messed something up (or your internet plan was cancelled)

Read full topic

item.title: I need some more help
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Wow…I’m stupid…Misunderstood your question. So your internet is down and your dads isn’t?

item.title: I need some more help
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

…Your computer has a different Ip than your dads. And no-ip re direct’s the name to the ip which it allows them to access the server. So you would have to have a dedicated server or something else that idk.

Read full topic
